job.title: Senior Data Scientist
job.industry: Marketing and Advertising,Information Technology and Services
job.description: <p><strong>Senior Data Scientist</strong></p><p><strong>Travel, Leisure &amp; Tourism</strong></p><p><strong>$125,00 - $140,000 plus bonus &amp; benefits </strong></p><p><strong>Remote (US BASED - EST)</strong></p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>THE COMPANY: </strong></p><p>An eCommerce company operating in the leisure, travel, and tourism industry is searching for a Senior Data Scientist to join their team. This organization focuses primarily on the travel rewards and benefits subsector. My client has recently entered a high growth period and is looking to scale their analytics division.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>THE ROLE:</strong></p><p>In the role of Senior Data Scientist, you will be responsible for analyzing products and marketing campaigns as well as handling data decision models. This will include managing A/B testing platforms as well as building ranking models and pricing models. </p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>YOUR SKILLS AND EXPERIENCES:</strong></p><p>The Senior Data Scientist must have:</p><ul><li>Commercial experience with logistic regression, gradient boosting, and XG Boost</li><li>Hands-on exercise with using both SQL and Python on a regular basis</li><li>Previously worked in an eCommerce or customer data-focused environment</li><li>Ability to multitask, handle several roles with different areas of focus</li></ul><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>THE BENEFITS:</strong></p><p>As a Director of Analytics, you can earn as much as $140,000 per year depending on your experience, as well as several different bonuses, benefits, including unlimited PTO.</p><p><strong>&nbsp;</strong></p><p><strong>HOW TO APPLY:</strong></p><p>Please register your interest by sending your CV to Andrew Bauersfeld via the Apply link on this page.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>KEYWORDS:</strong></p><p><em>Senior Data Scientist, Data Scientist, Logistic Regression, Gradient Boost, XG Boost, SQL, Python, eCommerce, Customer, Data, Analysis, Analytics, Travel, Tourism, Leisure, Rewards, Benefits</em></p>
